name: Image Protection
description: Provides a few ways to help protect your images.

events.label: Disable Events
events.info: This prevents your images from being dragged to the desktop or right+click to download.

pinterest.label: Disable Pinterest
pinterest.info: This prevents your images from being pinned on Pinterest.

pinterest_msg.label: Pinterest Message
pinterest_msg.info: This is an optional message that will be shown to Pinterest users when they attempt to pin your images. This will only be shown if you have disabled pinterest.
pinterest_msg.placeholder: Sorry, this site does not allow pinning
